verses.verse: To you,<WH3068> Yahweh, do I lift up<WH5375> my soul.<WH5315>
My God,<WH430> I have trusted<WH982> in you.<WH954> Don't let me be shamed. Don't<WH341> let my enemies triumph over me.<WH5970>
Yes,<WH6960> no one who waits for you shall be shamed.<WH954> They shall be shamed<WH954> who deal treacherously<WH898> without cause.<WH7387>
Show<WH3045> me your ways,<WH1870> Yahweh.<WH3068> Teach<WH3925> me your paths.<WH734>
Guide<WH1869> me in your truth,<WH571> and teach<WH3925> me,<WH430> For you are the God of my salvation,<WH3468> I wait<WH6960> for you all day long.<WH3117>
Yahweh,<WH3068> remember<WH2142> your tender mercies<WH7356> and your loving kindness,<WH7356> for they are from old times.<WH5769>

Don't<WH2142> remember the sins<WH2403> of my youth,<WH5271> nor my transgressions.<WH6588> Remember<WH2142> me according to your loving kindness,<WH2617> for your goodness<WH2898>' sake,<WH3068> Yahweh.
Good<WH2896> and upright<WH3477> is Yahweh,<WH3068> therefore he will instruct<WH3384> sinners<WH2400> in the way.<WH1870>
He will guide<WH1869> the humble<WH6035> in justice.<WH4941> He will teach<WH3925> the humble<WH6035> his way.<WH1870>
All the paths<WH734> of Yahweh<WH3068> are loving kindness<WH2617> and truth<WH571> to such as keep<WH5341> his covenant<WH1285> and his testimonies.<WH5713>
For your name<WH8034>'s sake,<WH3068> Yahweh, pardon<WH5545> my iniquity,<WH5771> for it is great.<WH7227>
What man<WH376> is he who fears<WH3373> Yahweh?<WH3068> He shall instruct<WH3384> him in the way<WH1870> that he shall choose.<WH977>
His soul<WH5315> shall dwell<WH3885> at ease.<WH2896> His seed<WH2233> shall inherit<WH3423> the land.<WH776>
The friendship<WH5475> of Yahweh<WH3068> is with those who fear<WH3373> him.<WH3045> He will show them his covenant.<WH1285>
My eyes<WH5869> are ever<WH8548> on Yahweh,<WH3068> for he will pluck<WH3318> my feet<WH7272> out of the net.<WH7568>
Turn<WH6437> to me,<WH2603> and have mercy on me,<WH3173> for I am desolate and afflicted.<WH6041>
The troubles<WH6869> of my heart<WH3824> are enlarged.<WH7337> Oh bring me out<WH3318> of my distresses.<WH4691>
Consider<WH7200> my affliction<WH6040> and my travail.<WH5999> Forgive<WH5375> all my sins.<WH2403>
Consider<WH7200> my enemies,<WH341> for they are many.<WH7231> They hate<WH8130> me with cruel<WH2555> hatred.<WH8135>
Oh keep<WH8104> my soul,<WH5315> and deliver<WH5337> me.<WH954> Let me not be disappointed, for I take refuge in you.<WH2620>
Let integrity<WH8537> and uprightness<WH3476> preserve<WH5341> me,<WH6960> for I wait for you.
Redeem<WH6299> Israel,<WH3478> God,<WH430> out all of his troubles.<WH6869>
